memberdef.name: GTEST_HAS_STD_WSTRING
memberdef.initializer: (!(GTEST_OS_LINUX_ANDROID || GTEST_OS_CYGWIN || GTEST_OS_SOLARIS || \ GTEST_OS_HAIKU || GTEST_OS_ESP32 || GTEST_OS_ESP8266 || GTEST_OS_XTENSA))

memberdef.name: GTEST_HAS_PTHREAD
memberdef.initializer: (GTEST_OS_LINUX || GTEST_OS_MAC || GTEST_OS_HPUX || GTEST_OS_QNX || \ GTEST_OS_FREEBSD || GTEST_OS_NACL || GTEST_OS_NETBSD || GTEST_OS_FUCHSIA || \ GTEST_OS_DRAGONFLY || GTEST_OS_GNU_KFREEBSD || GTEST_OS_OPENBSD || \ GTEST_OS_HAIKU)

memberdef.name: GTEST_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN_
memberdef.initializer: type(type const&) = delete; \ type& operator=(type const&) = delete

memberdef.name: GTEST_DISALLOW_MOVE_AND_ASSIGN_
memberdef.initializer: type(type&&) noexcept = delete; \ type& operator=(type&&) noexcept = delete

memberdef.name: GTEST_CHECK_POSIX_SUCCESS_
memberdef.initializer: if (const int gtest_error = (posix_call)) \ GTEST_LOG_(FATAL) << #posix_call << "failed with error " \ << gtest_error
